verses.verse: Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H834>anyone<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> that I may <S%H6213>show<s%> him <S%H2617>kindness<s%> for Jonathan's <S%H5668>sake<s%>?"

Now there was a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H6717>Ziba,<s%> and they <S%H7121>called<s%> him to <S%H1732>David;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Are you <S%H6717>Ziba<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "[I am] your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>"

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is <S%H657>there<s%> not <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H376>anyone<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to whom I may <S%H6213>show<s%> the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>?" And <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "There is <S%H5750>still<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> who is <S%H5223>crippled<s%> in both <S%H7272>feet.<s%>"

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H375>"Where<s%> is he?" And <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> he is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%> in Lo-debar."
Then <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H3947>brought<s%> him from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel,<s%> from Lo-debar.

And <S%H4648>Mephibosheth,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> and <S%H7812>prostrated<s%> himself. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4648>"Mephibosheth.<s%>" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>"Here<s%> is your <S%H5650>servant!<s%>"

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> for I will <S%H6213>surely<s%> <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to you for the <S%H5668>sake<s%> of your father <S%H1>Jonathan,<s%> and will <S%H3083>restore<s%> to you <S%H7725>all<s%> the <S%H3605>land<s%> of your grandfather <S%H7704>Saul;<s%> and you shall <S%H1>eat<s%> at my <S%H7586>table<s%> <S%H398>regularly.<s%>"

Again he <S%H7812>prostrated<s%> himself and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"What<s%> is your <S%H5650>servant,<s%> that you should <S%H6437>regard<s%> a <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H3611>dog<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> me?"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H6717>Ziba,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3605>"All<s%> that <S%H1961>belonged<s%> to Saul and to <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1004>house<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to your master's <S%H1121>grandson.<s%>

"And you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H5647>cultivate<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> for him, and you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in [the produce] so that your master's <S%H1121>grandson<s%> may <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3899>food;<s%> nevertheless <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> your master's <S%H1121>grandson<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> at my <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H8548>regularly.<s%>" Now <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> had <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5650>servants.<s%>

Then <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> "According to <S%H3605>all<s%> that my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commands<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> will <S%H6213>do.<s%>" So <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> <S%H398>ate<s%> at David's <S%H7979>table<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> of the king's <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

And <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> had a <S%H6996>young<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4316>Mica.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H4186>lived<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6717>Ziba<s%> were <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H4648>Mephibosheth.<s%>

So <S%H4648>Mephibosheth<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> for he <S%H398>ate<s%> at the king's <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H8548>regularly.<s%> Now he was <S%H6455>lame<s%> in <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
